title: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
subtitle: Gang Violence
series: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
tagline: Some hostels are a bargain. Others cost you your life.

synopsis.short: A naive do-gooder volunteering at a hostel in a rough neighborhood gets caught in gang crossfire while trying to "understand both sides."

death_teaser: He came to make peace. He left in pieces.
